Service Details: Offers dental services including composite restorations, root canal therapy, wisdom teeth removal, dentures, all-on-4 teeth in a day, CEREC one visit crowns, porcelain crowns and veneers, Invisalign Braces, porcelain bridges, teeth whitening, cleaning and prevention, periodontal (gum) disease, and periowave laser light
Hours: Mon: 8:00am - 8:00pmTue: 8:00am - 8:00pmWed: 8:30am - 6:00pmThu: 8:30am - 5:30pmFri: 9:00am - 3:00pmSat: 9:00am - 1:00pmEmergencies available weekend and evenings by appointment
